page.title: 05Shilton First School
page.content: The school has 36 children aged 4_8 years.On average the school takes in 6 new pupils a year.If the children come from{Barnacle or Ansty}they will probably arrive by car.Most children from{Shilton}walk.The numbers of children going to the school have not increased over the years. There are two full-time teachers including the headmaster.Also, one lady comes in one day a week. The headmaster,{Mr. Holmes},has been in the school for 14 years.He is a full-time teacher as well as a caretaker.What he{enjoys}about the job is watching the children develop and succeed, but he{dislikes}the constant interruptions when he is teaching,like telephone calls.
